data.lyric:
[ti:Mine (Explicit)]
[ar:Bazzi]
[al:Mine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Mine - Bazzi
[00:07.26]I just had a lil' bit too much of Hennessey
[00:10.34]Just gotta tell you how I feel
[00:11.48]
[00:14.58]You so you so precious when you smile
[00:18.26]
[00:21.13]Hit it from the back and drive you wild
[00:24.83]
[00:27.70]Girl I lose myself up in those eyes eye eye eye eyes
[00:33.39]
[00:34.51]I just had to let you know you're
[00:37.72]Mine
[00:38.89]
[00:41.37]Hands on your body I don't wanna waste no time
[00:45.56]
[00:48.18]Feels like forever even if forever's tonight
[00:52.44]Just lay with me waste this night away with me
[00:57.77]You're mine
[01:00.80]
[01:01.58]I can't look away
[01:02.71]
[01:03.23]I just gotta say
[01:04.73]I'm so happy that you're alive
[01:08.56]
[01:11.41]Swear to god I'm down if you're down all you gotta say is right
[01:15.78]
[01:18.22]Girl anything I can do just to make you feel alright oh oh oh oh
[01:25.03]I just had to let you know you're fine
[01:28.61]
[01:29.75]Running circles 'round my mind
[01:31.13]
[01:31.78]Even when it's rainy all you ever do is shine
[01:34.63]You on fire
[01:36.34]You a star just like Mariah
[01:38.33]Man this feel incredible I'll turn into a bride
[01:41.96]Mine
[01:42.54]
[01:45.04]Hands on your body I don't wanna waste no time
[01:49.17]
[01:51.92]Feels like forever even if forever's tonight
[01:56.20]Just lay with me waste this night away with me
[02:01.39]You're mine
[02:04.62]
[02:05.42]I can't look away
[02:06.79]I just gotta say
data.trans:
[ti:Mine (Explicit)]
[ar:Bazzi]
[al:Mine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.26]我只是轩尼诗喝得有点多
[00:10.34]实话告诉你我的感受
[00:11.48]
[00:14.58]你的微笑对我来说如此珍贵
[00:18.26]
[00:21.13]从身后与你缠绵 让你陷入疯狂
[00:24.83]
[00:27.70]女孩 我迷失在你深邃的眼眸中
[00:33.39]
[00:34.51]我只想让你知道
[00:37.72]你属于我
[00:38.89]
[00:41.37]轻抚你的娇躯 我不想浪费每分每秒
[00:45.56]
[00:48.18]感觉此刻已是永恒 即便永恒停留在今夜
[00:52.44]躺在我的怀里 与我挥霍今晚
[00:57.77]你属于我
[01:00.80]
[01:01.58]我无法移开视线
[01:02.71]
[01:03.23]我只想对你说
[01:04.73]我很开心你如此充满活力
[01:08.56]
[01:11.41]向上帝发誓 我会体会你的喜怒哀乐 你说的话全是对的
[01:15.78]
[01:18.22]女孩 我能做的就是让你开心快乐
[01:25.03]我只想让你知道你很好
[01:28.61]
[01:29.75]我的脑海里全都是你
[01:31.13]
[01:31.78]就算阴雨绵绵 你也能给我带来光芒
[01:34.63]你太棒了
[01:36.34]你是一颗明星 像玛利亚一样闪耀
[01:38.33]这感觉不可思议 我会让你变成我的新娘
[01:41.96]属于我
[01:42.54]
[01:45.04]轻抚你的娇躯 我不想浪费每分每秒
[01:49.17]
[01:51.92]感觉此刻已是永恒 即便永恒停留在今夜
[01:56.20]躺在我的怀里 与我挥霍今晚
[02:01.39]你属于我
[02:04.62]
[02:05.42]我无法移开视线
[02:06.79]我只想对你说
